[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/multisig_account.rs] [Function: Approve::execute()] [Approval Replay] After a transaction is executed or rejected, can old approval transactions be replayed to approve future transactions with the same sequence number? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/multisig_account.rs] [Function: Approve::execute()] [Sequence Number Manipulation] Can an attacker approve a non-existent sequence_number, pre-approving future malicious transactions before they're even proposed? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/multisig_account.rs] [Function: Approve::execute()] [Race Condition] Can concurrent approvals from multiple owners cause approval count inconsistencies or allow execution with insufficient signatures? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/multisig_account.rs] [Function: Approve::execute()] [Approval After Execution] Can approvals be submitted after a transaction is already executed, potentially affecting metrics or causing state confusion? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/multisig_account.rs] [Function: Reject::execute()] [Double Rejection] Similar to approval, can the same owner reject multiple times to artificially inflate rejection count and force premature transaction removal? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/multisig_account.rs] [Function: Reject::execute()] [Rejection Replay] Can rejection transactions be replayed to reject future transactions at the same sequence number, creating a permanent DoS? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/account/multisig_account.rs] [Function: Reject::execute()] [Non-Owner Rejection] Does the function verify rejector is an owner, or can external parties reject legitimate transactions to cause governance deadlock? (High)
